text: Ngempela uMvelinqangi waphenduka ngentethelelo kumphrofethi nakulabo ababefuduka (bevela eMakkah beya eMadina) nakubasizi abafuduki kanye nalabo abamlandela ngesikhathi esinzima emva kokuba izinhliziyo zengxenye yabo zasezisondele ekuphambukeni wayesebathethelela ngempela yena kubona unobubele unesihawu
